metadata.description: "Signé Bonaparte. Par le premier consul: le secrétaire d'État, signé Hugues B. Maret. Le ministre de l'intérieur, signé Chaptal"--P. 3
Caption title. Imprint at foot of p. 3
Dated: le vingt-un messidor, an neuf ... [10 July 1801]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Title page and cover are combined.
